text: State Route 207 (SR 207), also known as Park Road, is a short state highway in Lauderdale County, Tennessee. It connects SR 87 and the community of Fulton with Fort Pillow State Park. It is the primary road in and out of the park and is two-lane highway for its entire duration. ==Major intersections== ==References== 207 Category:Transportation in Lauderdale County, Tennessee
title: Tennessee State Route 207
